description: NASA’s Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter and India’s Chandrayaan-2 have captured images confirming the crash of Japan’s Resilience lander on the Moon’s Mare Frigoris. Contact with the lander was lost 100 seconds before its June 5 touchdown. New photos reveal a dark impact mark and scattered debris.
title: NASA and ISRO Confirm Japan’s Moon Lander Resilience Crashed at Mare Frigoris

description: Astronomers observed a supermassive black hole expelling gas at nearly a third the speed of light after consuming matter too fast. This outflow could suppress star formation by heating and ejecting gas, revealing how black holes regulate galaxy evolution. The finding helps decode the feedback mechanisms of quasars and active galactic nuclei in shaping cosmic structure.
title: Supermassive Black Hole Burps Matter at Near-Light Speeds After Consuming Gas Too Fast

description: Amazon’s Project Kuiper is intensifying efforts to compete in the low Earth orbit (LEO) broadband race. With 27 satellites launched in April 2025 and plans for a 3,200-satellite constellation, Amazon has locked in dozens of launches across ULA, Blue Origin, Arianespace, and SpaceX. This move follows its successful 2023 prototypes and aligns with a global push for satellite internet dominance. As Starlink maintains the lead and China expands its constellations, Kuiper aims to begin services by late 2025, signaling a pivotal moment in the future of global internet connectivity.
title: Amazon's Kuiper Launches 27 Satellites, Eyes 2025 LEO Broadband Rollout

description: A failed Soviet Venus probe from 1972 re-entered Earth’s atmosphere in May, yet tracking its final descent baffled experts. Despite decades of observation, differing models and unpredictable atmospheric conditions prevented precise predictions. Scientists now see Kosmos-482 as a case study in the enduring challenges of satellite reentry and the need for better space debris tracking.
title: Soviet Venus Probe Kosmos-482 Re-enters Earth’s Atmosphere After 52 Years, Location Unclear

description: Manoj Bajpayee as Srikant Tiwari is returning on Amazon Prime Video in Season 3. The makers on Instagram announced the show with a caption stating it was coming soon, with Manoj Bajpayee in the centre and a caption stating , “All eyes on our family, man”.
title: The Family Man Season 3 OTT Release Teased: What You Need to Know

description: The Rubin Observatory’s first image captures 10 million galaxies, marking the start of a decade-long sky survey. With its powerful telescope and LSST camera, it will scan the southern sky every three nights, unveiling hidden galaxies, stellar nurseries, and transient cosmic events. Scientists anticipate transformative discoveries about dark matter, dark energy, and the evolving universe.
title: Vera C. Rubin Observatory Unveils First Images, Hints at Universe’s Dynamic Secrets Ahead

description: The CMF Buds 2a are now available for purchase in India at Rs. 2,199. They feature 12.4mm Bio-Fibre drivers with Dirac Tuning, up to 42dB ANC with Transparency and Smart Adaptive Modes. They support Bluetooth 5.4, dual device connectivity, and Ultra Bass Technology 2.0. A six-mic system with Clear Voice and Wind Noise Reduction 2.0 is claimed to improve call clarity. They are said to last for up to 35.5 hours with the case, on a single charge.
title: CMF Buds 2a Now Available for Purchase in India: Check Price, Features

description: Fairphone 6 has launched in select global markets. It comes with a 6.3-inch OLED display and runs on a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor. It has a five-year warranty and the company promises eight years of software support for the phone.
title: Fairphone 6 With Snapdragon 7s Gen 3, User-Replaceable 4,415mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Grok, the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot developed by xAI, might soon get a file editor feature. A tipster claimed that the Elon Musk-owned AI firm is working on this feature, which might support different file types, including spreadsheets. With this, users can chat with Grok and ask it to make changes to various documents.
title: Grok to Get AI-Powered File Editor Feature With Spreadsheet Support, Tipster Claims

description: Netflix Games is removing over 20 titles from its library next month. Roguelike action title Hades and the entire Monument Valley series will elave the subscription service. The service, which features over 120 mobile games, is accesible to all Netflix subscribers.
title: Netflix Games Will Romove Over 20 Titles, Including Hades, Next Month

description: Google might have sent an email to some Android users on Tuesday highlighting that soon, the Gemini artificial intelligence (AI) assistant will interact with several on-device apps, whether the feature is turned on or not. Several users have shared screenshots of these emails on social media posts, where the Mountain View-based tech giant has highlighted that this change will be automatically rolled out starting July 7.
title: Google May Soon Let Gemini Interact With WhatsApp, Phone App on Android Even If Feature Is Disabled

description: The Vivo X Fold 5 features an 8.03-inch inner screen and a 6.83-inch cover display with a 4,500 nits brightness level. It is equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC and offers up to 16GB of RAM and 1TB of inbuilt storage. The phone runs on Android 15-based OriginOS 5 skin on top. It gets a Zeiss-backed 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit and dual 20-megapixel selfie cameras. The Vivo X Fold 5 packs a 6,000mAh battery with 80W wired and 40W wireless charging support.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 With 8.03-Inch Flexible Display, 50-Megapixel Periscope Camera Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Xiaomi will unveil its Al Glasses on June 26 at 7pm (4:30pm IST) in China. The company has posted teasers on Weibo confirming the arrival of the new smart glasses. The event will also introduce the Xiaomi Mix Flip 2, Redmi K80 Ultra, Xiaomi Pad 7S Pro and Redmi K Pad.
title: Xiaomi Al Glasses Confirmed to Launch on June 26 Alongside Mix Flip 2

description: YouTube Music has quietly rolled out a new feature allowing users to view lyrics offline. Subscribers who have downloaded tracks with lyrics can now access them without an internet connection. Rivals Spotify and Apple Music don't offer offline lyric access at the moment.
title: YouTube Music Adds Offline Lyrics Support for Downloaded Songs

description: Nvidia GeForce RTX 5050 was launched on Tuesday, and the successor to the RTX 3050 features Nvidia's Blackwell CUDA cores and 8GB of video memory. It is positioned below the RTX 5060, and supports ray tracing, Nvidia Reflex, and DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (MFG), according to the company.
title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 5050 GPU for Desktops, Gaming Laptops Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Redmi will bring a new colour variant of the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ and Redmi Note 14 Pro to the Indian market. The new Champagne Gold colour variant will be launched on July 1 at 12pm. Currently, the Note 14 Pro handsets are available in Spectre Blue, Phantom Purple, and Titan Black shades.
title: Redmi Note 14 Pro+, Redmi Note 14 Pro New Colour Variant Coming to India on July 1

description: Samsung launched its 2025 series of Bespoke AI smart appliances in India on Wednesday. The South Korean tech giant is introducing a new AI Laundry Combo with integrated washing and drying, a WindFree Air Conditioner, a Double Door Refrigerator, and a Top Load Washer as part of the 2025 Bespoke AI series.
title: Samsung 2025 Bespoke AI Appliances Launched in India, Introduces New Bespoke AI Laundry Combo

description: Anthropic's use of books without permission to train its AI system was legal under US copyright law, a federal judge in San Francisco ruled late on Monday. The company told the court that it made fair use of the books and that US copyright law "not only allows, but encourages" its AI training because it promotes human creativity.
title: Anthropic Wins Key US Ruling on AI Training in Authors' Copyright Lawsuit

description: Dying Light is getting a free update that brings enhancements to graphics and audio this week. The 'Retouched' update will improve textures, lighting, shadow quality and other visual details in the game, developer Techland announced.
title: Dying Light: Retouched Update Rolls Out June 26, Bringing Graphical Enhancements

description: Google DeepMind released a new Gemini Robotics artificial intelligence (AI) model on Tuesday that can operate entirely locally. Dubbed Gemini Robotics On-Device, it is a voice-language-action (VLA) model that can make robots perform a wide range of tasks in real-world environments. Currently, the model is available to those who have signed up for its trusted tester programme.
title: Google Introduces Gemini Robotics On-Device AI Model, Can Adapt to Different Types of Robots

description: The Honor X9c will launch in India soon, exclusively via Amazon. It will feature a 6.78-inch 1.5K curved AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and up to 4,000 nits brightness. The phone will be equipped with a 6,600mAh battery with 66W SuperCharge support, and a 108-megapixel main rear camera with 3x lossless zoom, OIS and EIS support. The Honor X9c will ship with Android 15-based MagicOS 9.0.
title: Honor X9c India Launch Confirmed; to Get 108-Megapixel Rear Camera, 1.5K Curved AMOLED Display

description: Oppo Reno 14F 5G has been launched in Taiwan. It features a 6.57-inch full-HD+ (1,080x2,372 pixels) OLED display and is equipped with a Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset. The new Reno 14F packs up to 12GB of LPDDR4X RAM and 512GB of UFS 3.1 storage. It features a triple rear camera setup.
title: Oppo Reno 14F 5G With Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core were expected to be introduced alongside the next generation of Galaxy foldables on July 9. However, the South Korean tech conglomerate has now teased a launch date much earlier than its Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event. A microsite dedicated to the launch on an e-commerce platform teases that the TWS earphones will go on sale on June 27.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core to Be Available for Purchase in India on June 27

description: ElevenLabs mobile app for Android and iOS has been officially launched. The app offers the company’s artificial intelligence (AI)-powered text-to-speech generation capabilities. Powered by the Eleven v3 (alpha) AI model, the app can convert text into an expressive, human-like voice in different languages. Users can also select between male, female, and neutral voices.
title: ElevenLabs Launches AI Text-to-Speech Generation App for Android and iOS

description: Google Chrome has rolled out a new update for its Android app which lets users change the position of the address bar. It can now be moved to the bottom of the screen on the web browser for more flexibility. As per Google, this change makes it easier to use Chrome for Android on devices with different-sized screens, enabling users with varied hand sizes to adjust its position as per their preference.
title: Google Chrome for Android Now Lets You Move Address Bar to the Bottom of the App

description: Honor Magic V5 is confirmed to come with a 6,100mAh battery. Ahead of the July 2 launch in China, an alleged unboxing video of the Honor Magic V5 has popped up on the Web showing its design and specifications. The video shows that the phone will come with a 66W adapter in the box. The Magic V5 is said to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: Honor Magic V5 Battery Capacity Teased; Alleged Unboxing Video Suggests Specifications

description: Apple's iPhone 17 Pro models are set for a major camera module redesign, according to recent reports, and images of the extended camera module stretching across the top of the rear panel have surfaced online. Leaked images now provide a closer look at the new design of the purported smartphone.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Rear Camera Module Design Spotted via Leaked Dummy Unit Images

description: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G is now available for purchase in India via Amazon and the official iQOO store. It starts at Rs. 9,999 for the 4GB + 128GB option. The phone sports a 6.74-inch HD+ 90Hz LCD screen, a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC with up to 8GB RAM support, and runs Android 15-based FuntouchOS 15. The handset has a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup, a 5-megapixel selfie shooter, and a 6,000mAh battery with 15W charging support.
title: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Offers and Specifications

description: The JBL Endurance Zone open-ear earphones feature a flexible ear hook, an IP68 rating, and JBL’s OpenSound tech for environmental awareness. They include an 18mm and an 11mm dual-driver setup and support Adaptive Bass Boost. The headset supports Bluetooth 5.3, Google Fast Pair, and multipoint connectivity. The earbuds have a 58mAh battery each, while the case has a 520mAh cell. They are said to offer up to 32 hours of total playback time.
title: JBL Endurance Zone Open-Ear Sports Earphones With Up to 32 Hours of Total Battery Life Launched

description: Microsoft will end support for Windows 10 in October, and while licensed users can upgrade to Windows 11 for free, many older PCs aren't compatible. However, Microsoft says users can join the Extended Security Updates (ESU) programme for free, delaying the switch to Windows 11 and receiving crucial security updates until October 2026.
title: Microsoft Lets Windows 10 Users Get Extended Security Updates Until 2026 for Free

description: Microsoft will reportedly cut jobs at its gaming division next week. This would be the fourth round of layoffs at Xbox since the beginning of 2024. Last year, the Xbox parentshut down three Xbox studios.
title: Microsoft Reportedly Planning 'Substantial' Layoffs at Xbox Division Next Week

description: Axiom-4 mission (also known as Ax-4), which is carrying four astronauts to the International Space Station (ISS), is finally taking off today (Wednesday). The mission was originally scheduled to take off on June 10, but it was delayed several times due to technical issues. The mission also marks an important moment for India as the Indian Space Research Organisation’s (ISRO) Shubhanshu Shukla will become the first Indian to take a spaceflight in the last 40 years.
title: Axiom-4 Mission Launch: Take-Off Time, Mission Details and How to Watch Live Stream

description: Bitget has announced a partnership with India's cyber-crime focussed Sahyog Portal to help in related investigations. As part of its contribution to Sahyog, Bitget said it will help the law investigating officers access technical tools that are required for digital evidence collection.
title: Bitget Joins India's ‘Sahyog’ Cyber Crime Portal to Aid Investigations

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) has introduced a new service which enables home delivery of its SIM cards in India. The state-owned telecom operator has launched a new online portal which allows consumers to get SIM cards delivered to their home without leaving the premises. Consumers can choose between prepaid and postpaid SIM connection options. They will be required to carry out a self KYC (know your customer) verification before the SIM card delivery can be completed.
title: BSNL Launches Portal for Doorstep Delivery of SIM Cards With Self-KYC Verification: How to Get It

description: Google is rumoured to announce the Pixel 10 series in August. Ahead of the expected launch, a new report states that the Pixel 10, just like the Pixel 9, will not have a vapour chamber. It is also said to lack support for Wi-Fi 7 connectivity. Further, the rumoured "Ultra Res Zoom" feature is said to be limited to the Pixel 10 Pro models.
title: Google Pixel 10 to Miss Out on Vapour Chamber, Wi-Fi 7, and More: Report
Master the Digital Future - YESminer Quantitative Trading Platform Makes Your Cryptocurrency Investment Smarter and More Efficient!

description: Nothing Phone 3’s new Glyph Matrix retains the Glyph Interface’s core essence but makes it more programmable, Adam Bates, Head of Design at Nothing, explained in a recent interview. It is also said to free up internal space for better hardware layout. The compact micro-LED cluster is said to support pixel-level animations and reactive lighting for personalised alerts on the Phone 3.
title: Nothing Phone 3 to Bring Animated Pixel Art Alerts via Glyph Matrix: Report

description: Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition was launched on Tuesday. It is a limited edition model of the affordable mixed reality (MR) headset, which was first introduced by Meta in September 2024. The Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition comes with a preloaded Xbox app that serves as a hub through which users can launch game titles via the Xbox Cloud Gaming (Beta).
title: Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition With Xbox App, Complementary Game Pass Ultimate Subscription Launched

description: Vu Vibe DV TV was launched in India on Tuesday. The TV comes in five display size options, from 43-inch to 75-inch, and all variants are equipped with 4K resolution QLED screens supporting 400 nits peak brightness and bezel-less designs. A VuON AI Processor powers the Vu Vibe DV TV and it runs on Google TV OS. For audio, it gets an 88W integrated soundbar with Dolby Atmos support.
title: Vu Vibe DV TV With 4K QLED Screen, 88W Integrated Soundbar Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: The Samsung Galaxy M36 5G is expected to go official in India soon. In recent weeks, the company has been teasing several details about the handset including its design and some of its features, while leaks have also given us a pretty good idea of what to expect. Here's all you need to know about the Galaxy M36 5G including its launch date, expected price in India, features, specifications, and more.
title: Samsung Galaxy M36 5G: Launch Date, Expected Price in India and Specifications
